references.paper_title: Recent advances in natural language processing via large pre-trained language models: A survey
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive overview of advancements in NLP using large pre-trained language models, which is highly relevant to the field of keyphrase extraction.

references.paper_title: A survey on recent advances in keyphrase extraction from pre-trained language models
references.reason: This survey focuses specifically on keyphrase extraction techniques utilizing pre-trained language models, directly addressing the core methodology of the LongKey framework.

references.paper_title: Keyword and keyphrase extraction techniques: a literature review
references.reason: This review provides a foundational overview of keyphrase extraction techniques, offering a broad context for understanding the different approaches explored in the LongKey paper.

references.paper_title: BERT: Pre-training of deep bidirectional transformers for language understanding
references.reason: The BERT model is a crucial component used by several keyphrase extraction methods, including LongKey, forming a core building block for many of the techniques discussed in the paper.
The Longformer model is a critical component of the LongKey framework, enabling the processing of long documents, which was a significant limitation of existing methods.
